title: Katy Perry | Fox News
description: Katy Perry is a singer-songwriter and TV personality, rising to fame in 2008 with hits such as "I Kissed A Girl" and "Hot N' Cold."

paragraphs: This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. ©2025 FOX News Network, LLC. All rights reserved. Quotes displayed in real-time or delayed by at least 15 minutes. Market data provided by Factset. Powered and implemented by FactSet Digital Solutions. Legal Statement. Mutual Fund and ETF data provided by Refinitiv Lipper.
Sophie Grégoire opens up about handling emotions as ex-husband Justin Trudeau dates Katy Perry, choosing to "listen to music instead of noise" amid public scrutiny.
Katy Perry opens up about releasing vulnerable new single "Bandaids," sharing her months of hesitation and hope that fans going through heartbreak will find strength.
Katy Perry releases emotional new single following Orlando Bloom split, with unfiltered lyrics about heartbreak and disappointment in relationships.
Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau's romance heats up with Halloween hints as the pop star confirms she's dating someone and the former Canadian prime minister's costume sparks "Left Shark" buzz.
Christian singer Forrest Frank sparks heated debate after sharing video warning believers about Halloween's alleged spiritual dangers and satanic connections.
Justin Trudeau's relationship with Katy Perry has reportedly improved his life following his 2023 split from his wife, while the pop star moved on quickly after Orlando Bloom breakup.
Celebrity hotspot Crazy Horse Paris welcomes another A-list couple as Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau enjoy burlesque show together for her birthday weekend.
Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau make their public debut as a couple, stepping out hand-in-hand at Crazy Horse Paris for the pop star's 41st birthday celebration.
From his latest romance with pop powerhouse Katy Perry to his friendly ties to Hollywood stars, Justin Trudeau's political star power proves a mastery of the spotlight.
Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau are reportedly "quite taken with each other" after their yacht date, with sources saying they share intellectual interests and attraction.
In photos obtained by Fox News Digital, Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau were spotted sharing some PDA while aboard Perry's yacht, the Caravelle, off the coast of Santa Barbara.
Orlando Bloom discussed his recent breakup with Katy Perry while on "Today," saying he is "grateful" for their daughter and adding there is "nothing but love" between them.
Orlando Bloom revealed the grueling toll of losing a third of his body weight for "The Cut," calling himself a "horrible person" during filming.
Katy Perry, who took the stand in the ongoing legal battle over her $15 million mansion on Tuesday, detailed how the outcome of the lawsuit may impact her.
Katy Perry showed off her svelte figure in a bikini as she relaxed on a Miami beach during a break from her worldwide tour and ahead of testifying in the court battle over her $15 million mansion.

Katy Perry's will give her testimony on August 26 in a $15 million Montecito mansion lawsuit against the Wescott family. The trial was split into two parts by the judge. The damages phase took place last year and the penalty phase kicked off this week.
Chris Pratt has been pulled into the legal feud between Katy Perry and the Wescott family over her $15 million Montecito mansion.
"Real Housewives of Dallas" alum Kameron Westcott spoke out about her family's five-year legal battle with Katy Perry over a $15 million Montecito mansion sale.
Katy Perry stopped her Detroit concert when young fan McKenna collapsed on stage after being invited up during the performance on August 3.
(Video credit: Courtney Burmeister via Storyful) Pop star Katy Perry stopped her show in Detroit, Michigan, after a fan collapsed on stage.
A fan video showed Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau attending Katy Perry’s concert in Montreal. (Video credit: @ridmi/TMX)
Days after Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau were spotted dining together, the former Canadian prime minister attended the "Teenage Dream" crooner's sold-out concert in Canada.
Katy Perry spotted dining with former Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in Montreal amid her world tour break and following her split from Orlando Bloom.
Pop star Katy Perry faced a frightening malfunction when her butterfly prop became stuck midair during her San Francisco performance.
Orlando Bloom has touched down in Italy for Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez's wedding amid reports that he split with longtime fiancee Katy Perry.
A man was arrested after ambushing Katy Perry on stage during her Lifetimes Tour in Sydney, Australia. Security removed the disruptive fan from the performance.
Lauren Sanchez's Paris bachelorette party featured stars like Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry, as she prepares to wed Amazon founder Jeff Bezos.
NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal claimed Blue Origin founder Jeff Bezos used "green screen" technology rather than sending Lauren Sanchez and Katy Perry to space.
Spring has sprung and April was a month marked by out-of-control judges and a leftist writer from the Nation calling the U.S. Constitution, “a piece of crap."
Weeks after embarking on an 11-minute flight to space on the Blue Origin spacecraft, Katy Perry said she is "not perfect" as she continues to face ongoing criticism.
